EmailTemplate.description: FV2:The following email templates will be used to send email notifications to provisioning submitter after Approval/Rejection of Document Provisioning
EmailTemplate.name: Email Notification To Submitter After Approval Rejection
EmailTemplate.subject: Document Provisioning - {!Document_Provisioning__c.Design_Spec__c}{!Document_Provisioning__c.Sub_PDK__c} {!Document_Provisioning__c.Approval_Status__c} by {!Document_Provisioning__c.Spec_Owner__c}
